label: Draft, Letter from Avis Thompson and Andre V. Woods
description: Draft of a letter from Avis Thompson, Chairperson and Andre V. Woods, Co-Chairperson of the Souvenir Booklet Committee of the Charleston Branch of the NAACP, regarding the Charleston Branch of the NAACP's 70th Anniversary and Freedom Fund Banquet.
